https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1Ma8zFEzyOJkW3RL1JmPZOufzFL.jpg Malta, the late 1300s. Five soldiers are returning home from battle. Hungry and exhausted, they stumble upon a fort. What was meant to be a one-night stopover rapidly escalades into a whirlwind of intrigue and an epic sword fight for retribution. Will a beautiful woman change their destiny? Or are they doomed to die in their ever quest to protect their land against invaders? Adormidera
